text: Manuel José Dias Soares Costa (19 March 1933 – 2 September 2021) was a Portuguese politician and academic. He was the Minister of Agriculture from 1983 until 1984 during the Mario Soares government. Soares Costa died on 2 September 2021 in Lisbon, Portugal at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Portuguese politicians Category:Portuguese academics
title: Manuel Soares Costa
